title: Security Reminder: Be wary of scams!
body:
Hey ya’ll!

It’s been awhile since I’ve posted a reminder, but I wanted to do so again due to the amount of reports I’m receiving regarding in game phishing/spam links/etc.

Any promotions or events ran will be announced and confirmed by Riot -- www.riotgames.com, www.leagueoflegends.com, or www.lolesports.com.

**General Questions:**
**_Q: I was sent a suspicious link from a friend I trust but I don’t recognize it, what should I do?_**
A: **USE CAUTION!** If it’s not hosted on one of the websites above, we cannot ensure your computer’s security if you visit them. Remember, facechecking the web is dangerous, so use your best judgement. Be sure to have your antivirus programs up-to-date.

**_Q: But I entered my username and password into this website! Should I change my password?_**
A: **YES!** Please change your password immediately. You can change your password by logging into your [account management](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/management)  and clicking on change password.

**_Q: Is there any harm going to these free skin/RP generator websites but not doing anything?_**
A: **YES!** You never know what scripts are running in the background. If you’ve visited any suspicious websites, I would strongly suggest you go ahead and scan your computer with your preferred antivirus program.


If you cannot log into your account at all, you can recover your password by using the password recovery  [here](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/account/recovery/password). Still having issues? Please contact [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new).

We also have an extensive Knowledge Base article available with additional tips and tricks on what you can do to ensure your account is secure: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account – Please give this a thorough read if you have a chance!

replies.body:
TL;DR
Nothing is free, don't click anything that isn't Rito domain aka www.riotgames.com, www.leagueoflegends.com, or www.lolesports.com.
Read the important bits of [this page](http://www.riotgames.com/riot-games-security)  (add this to the main post @Riot Cluvie)

_Super Mega Security 101 FAQ of League of Legends_
Q: This site gives skins for people using my link! $o kewl! Imma spam this on Twitch chat! (_not really a question)_
A: It's a scam and a waste of time, and Twitch chat is already contaminated as it is, so don't.

Q: This dude promised me skins if I give him my account! Should I do it?
A: No.

Q: But I know him! I met him 30 minutes ago!
A: No.

Q: Please?
A: No.

Q: Do these RP generators I see in the comment section of League videos really work?
A: No.

Q: But they have a lot of upvotes!
A: No.

Q: Look it has 300 upvo-
A: It's fake. Upvotes bots.

Q: My friend picked Teemo support. What do I do?
A: Report him at the end-game lobby for Negative Attitude and type "Promoting Terrorism" in the notes section.

Q: My friend picked Teemo. What Do I do?
A: Report him at the end-game lobby for Negative Attitude and type "Promoting Terrorism" in the notes section.

Q: My frie-
A: You don't have any friends. You play League. Stop lying and get back in queue.

Q: Why Do Kids Love the Taste of Cinnamon Toast Crunch?
A: Because jet fuel can't melt dank memes.

_______________________________________________________________________________

What the hell am I doing with my life right now

> [{quoted}](name=idoki,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=etfw5oPc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-10T00:41:49.697+0000)
>
> TL;DR
> Nothing is free

Except League of Legends. :D
Don't believe these peasantry lies, everyone eventually pays.
It only costs all your ~~free~~ time.... :P
How can I trust that link? Lol
Read the ducking line before that.

My friend sent me a pool party rewards website and told me if I clicked on it he would get enough "points" for a free pool party skin of his choosing because riot felt sorry for nobody getting pool party mundo. I told him immediately to scan his comp for viruses because that's a scam. It's so sad that people actually fall for these scams even though everyone should know that they are scams by now.
I got this as well. I got suspicious reallly quickly.
